channel.title: [request] Object ID's, Item ID's, NPC ID's like MoparScape
channel.description:
I wanted to know if anyone has the codes for having the ID's of the NPC's, Item's, and Object's when you right click them.
It's like on MoparScape. Maybe Moparisthebest got it off someone else?
Also, the coords of the object/npc/item codes too.
Thanks :)
~Z

item.title: [request] Object ID's, Item ID's, NPC ID's like MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @Exception Exception
item.description:
@Exception wrote:

Thor38283828:

when you get back on the best way to get back on is finding a new server (changing numbers worked for me)

LOL! Only 3.403 × 10[sup]38[/sup] IP’s that could potentially have a server listening on 43594.

Read full topic

item.title: [request] Object ID's, Item ID's, NPC ID's like MoparScape
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

MastrChief:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf

MastrChief:

and try to stop double posting.

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:1, topic:223”][size=12pt]Rule 5:[/size]
We don’t “bump” posts on purpose or double post whether on purpose or by accident. If you want to add something to a post, edit your existing post. You are however, allowed to post in old topics if it is relevant to your problem.

[size=12pt]Rule 13:[/size]
Nothing to do with private servers belongs on moparisthebest.com, use moparisthebest.com/smf for these things.[/quote]

Read full topic
